name: Edward Stell
text: Great place  to do business with.

name: John Willis
text: They got all the tools you need!

name: Brian Rucker
text: Very knowledgeable people

name: Mark Blumer
text: As an electrical contractor from Kansas, who works all over the country, I give these guys a 100%  this is the second time I have done business with them in the last year and they have had what I needed at every turn.  I deal with supply houses all over the country, and believe me when I say, if I dont need it today in Texas, they will get my business tomorrow. I Never seen a supply house like this that cared more for their customers. I could write a whole book, but thank you Calvin for helping us get this job done, and back home to our familes in a timely and productive fashion. We will be back, and we will buy our supplies from Buffalo!!

name: Walter Simpson
text: Very fast and efficient I got the item I was looking for in less than 5 minutes excellent service from the door really appreciate those guys

name: Bryant Gilmer
text: Awesome counter help. Was greated as soon as I walked in. They had what I needed in stock at Internet price too!!!!

name: George Young
text: Best in town

name: Alex "LiveWire" Huynh
text: AAAAAAAa

name: Tj Hamlet
text: hands down one of the best place to work .i enjoy working there the staff is nice and friendly and the business is wonderful. great management!!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for your review. We are working hard to server our employees and customers.

name: Nicolae Borta
text: Nice people,  empty in 25 min.

name: Mary Costlow
text: Mayer has a great selection of lighting to choose from on display.  They also carry many sizes of bulbs in stock.  The ladies working the showroom were friendly and knowledgeable about the stock.

name: Maggie Kessler
text: Susan and Amber have always been very easy to work with!

name: Jamie Householder
text: Mayer is the absolute best place for anything electrical or data related. Staff is knowledge and calls you by name; very fast and accurate; and always have great sales and specials. My go-to for tools, hard to find parts, and supplies.

name: Randy Dusenberry
text: Buyer Beware. If you can buy at Lowe’s do it. They purposefully overcharge and don’t know prices until they charge your card. I feel like I was ripped off. When I mention the price being high I there technician became combative and rude. Their loss since I own an electrical contracting company this was my first time and last time going to Mayer

name: Michael Sellers
text: If you need it, they have it. Great customer service.

name: James Jones
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Had just what I needed.

resp.text: We appreciate the rating and feedback, James.   Thank you.

name: Chris Lee
text: Great customer service, good selection, quick delivery and great prices.  I would gladly go here over the other stores in town.

name: Rebecca Lee
text: We've been customers for years. They're always willing to help. Great customer service. They really do go above and beyond the competition.

name: Mary Johns
text: Wonderful customer service. I called at 12:30 inquiring about a refrigerator,  they delivered one by 2:00!

name: Josh Miller
text: If you need any lighting appliances DO NOT COME HERE! Go see Brooks at Lighting Plus or somewhere else besides this pathetic place!

name: LP
text: If you need appliances for your home this is the place to go!  They handle everything.  Professional, knowledgeable and courteous staff.

name: Maricarmen Mejia
text: Very nice staff and knowledgeable of their products!

name: Kyoto spade
text: Mean manager and extremely racist

name: Big Bunn
text: Great place for appliances!

name: William Ferrell
text: great people great prices

name: steven teal
text: Great service and great poeple!

name: Juan Rodriguez
text: Great Customer Service

name: Michael Bowden
text: Exlent service

resp.text: We sure appreciate the 5-star rating, Michael.   Thanks!

name: Austin Park
text: Very helpful. Worked with me till I got what I needed with a smile the whole time.

name: Chris Pearce
text: The staff knows their inventory! They are eager to help as soon as you enter.

name: Kyle Brown
text: Basic electrical supplies. Does not stock as much as downtown location. Quasi friendly counter people.

name: Sue Stephens
text: Gexpro has a convenient location to me. They had the part I needed in stock. They provided excellent customer service! Thanks, Gexpro! You will be my go-to from here on for electrical supplies.

resp.text: Sue, we are so pleased to hear about your positive experience at our branch! Thank you for the feedback and for the 5-star review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Andrew Ohlinger
text: Great electrical and lighting supply. Very helpful counter staff. They also have a great stock of Klein and Southwire tools!

resp.text: Andrew, thanks so much for the 5-star review! We really appreciate you taking the time to write a review and your continued business.

name: Paul Goodridge
text: Great place to work and great boss to work with.  Friendly staff and great services.

resp.text: Thanks, Paul, for reviewing the branch. We appreciate it!

name: trent flowers
text: A little SLOW on ordering

resp.text: We apologize you had a negative experience with us with ordering. We strive to serve our customers at the highest level and hope we can connect with you to see how we can do better. Please reach out to our branch manager at (256) 774-1651 so we can correct the problem.

name: Greg Brown
text: Mayer is a top notch electric supply company I have used them for years and they are on time with material and will have it ready for you when you get there and there employees are very polite and will go out of there way for there customers they will take care of you and yes they are a top 5 for me and I will continue to use mayer for my electric supplies

name: Russell williams
text: Great place very kind and informative

resp.text: Russell, thank you for the review. We are glad you had a good experience and we appreciate you sharing it.

name: jeremysbrawley
text: Got me what I needed

resp.text: Jeremy, Thanks for the review. Glad you had a good experience!

name: Thomas Carver
text: Always a pleasure picked up exactly what I needed

name: Kyle Hamilton
text: Cheapest electrical supply in town. At least 25% cheaper than The Home Depot and Lowe's. Adam is the go to man at Mayer (Pelham location)

resp.text: Kyle, we appreciate you review and recommendation. Most importantly, we appreciate your business.

name: Rus Hardy
text: Excellent service!

name: The Dude
text: They are pretty good. Tend to look down their nose at people that don't come regularly.

resp.text: We are very sorry our service wasn't up to par. We never want a customer to feel unwelcome. Thanks for the feedback and we promise to do better!

name: John P
text: Friendly excellent service competitive prices

name: John Willis
text: Leon is awesome!

name: Perry Morgan
text: Leon is always very helpful and loving the curb side service.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Perry! Leon is a great teammate. We are thankful for your business.

name: jeremysbrawley
text: Very accommodating

name: Unkn0wn C0mmand
text: One of the best electrical supply places around. Their showrooms have so many light fixtures it can be dizzying. High quality merchandise at very good prices. Definitely check them out if you need anything that has to do with electrical or lighting. Highly recommended.

name: Jimy George
text: Best electrical supply option around downtown... Always have good products available at reasonable prices

name: Chy Goodwin
text: Price was a little higher than some other places but the customer service is great so worth it

name: james jordan
text: Great place for electrical supplys

name: Wesley Green
text: Good service

name: Jesse huey
text: Great electrical supply

name: John Walker
text: Very helpful staff

name: Jimmy Jacobs
text: Good service.

name: Joe Clem
text: Great
